sqlMap.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE , E.FEE_TP , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM(E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE) EXMP_AGENT_NM , P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM(#sPrtAtCode#, E.FEE_TP) FEE_NM , SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,NULL,0,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0))) EXMP_AMNT_SUM , SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),NULL,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT,0),0)) EXMP_AMNT_PA_SUM , ( SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,NULL,0,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0))) + SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),NULL,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT,0),0)) ) EXAM_AMNT_TOT_SUM FROM P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR E WHERE E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE LIKE #sExamAgentCode# || '%' GROUP BY E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE, E.FEE_TP, P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM(E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE), P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM(#sPrtAtCode#, E.FEE_TP) ORDER BY E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE, E.FEE_TP ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_CNT , TO_CHAR(SUM(SE.EXMP_AMNT_SUM), '999,999,999,999') TOT_EXMP_AMNT_SUM , TO_CHAR(SUM(SE.EXMP_AMNT_PA_SUM), '999,999,999,999') TOT_EXMP_AMNT_PA_SUM , TO_CHAR(SUM(SE.EXAM_AMNT_TOT_SUM), '999,999,999,999') TOT_EXAM_AMNT_TOT_SUM FROM ( SELECT E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE , E.FEE_TP , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM(E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE) EXMP_AGENT_NM , P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM(#sPrtAtCode#, E.FEE_TP) FEE_NM , SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,NULL,0,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0))) EXMP_AMNT_SUM , SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),NULL,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT,0),0)) EXMP_AMNT_PA_SUM , ( SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,NULL,0,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0))) + SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),NULL,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT,0),0)) ) EXAM_AMNT_TOT_SUM FROM P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR E WHERE E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE LIKE #sExamAgentCode# || '%' GROUP BY E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE, E.FEE_TP, P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM(E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE), P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM(#sPrtAtCode#, E.FEE_TP) ORDER BY E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE, E.FEE_TP ) SE

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(E.BILL_DT,'YYYYMM') EXMP_MONTH , E.FEE_TP , P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM(#sPrtAtCode#, E.FEE_TP) FEE_NM , SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,NULL,0,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0))) EXMP_AMNT_SUM , SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),NULL,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),0)) EXMP_AMNT_PA_SUM , ( SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,NULL,0,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0))) + SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),NULL,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),0)) ) EXAM_AMNT_TOT_SUM FROM P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR E WHERE E.BILL_DT >= TO_DATE((#sSearchFr# || '01'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND E.BILL_DT < ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE((#sSearchTo# || '01'), 'YYYYMMDD'), 1) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(E.BILL_DT,'YYYYMM'), E.FEE_TP ORDER BY EXMP_MONTH ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_CNT , TO_CHAR(SUM(SE.EXMP_AMNT_SUM), '999,999,999,999') TOT_EXMP_AMNT_SUM , TO_CHAR(SUM(SE.EXMP_AMNT_PA_SUM), '999,999,999,999') TOT_EXMP_AMNT_PA_SUM , TO_CHAR(SUM(SE.EXAM_AMNT_TOT_SUM), '999,999,999,999') TOT_EXAM_AMNT_TOT_SUM FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(E.BILL_DT,'YYYYMM') EXMP_MONTH , E.FEE_TP , P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM(#sPrtAtCode#, E.FEE_TP) FEE_NM , SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,NULL,0,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0))) EXMP_AMNT_SUM , SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),NULL,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),0)) EXMP_AMNT_PA_SUM , ( SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,NULL,0,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0))) + SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),NULL,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),0)) ) EXAM_AMNT_TOT_SUM FROM P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR E WHERE E.BILL_DT >= TO_DATE((#sSearchFr# || '01'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND E.BILL_DT < ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE((#sSearchTo# || '01'), 'YYYYMMDD'), 1) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(E.BILL_DT,'YYYYMM'), E.FEE_TP ORDER BY EXMP_MONTH ) SE

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM(E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE) EXMP_AGENT_NM , TO_CHAR(E.BILL_DT,'YYYYMM') EXMP_MONTH , E.FEE_TP , P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM(#sPrtAtCode#, E.FEE_TP) FEE_NM , SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,NULL,0,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0))) EXMP_AMNT_SUM , SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),NULL,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),0)) EXMP_AMNT_PA_SUM , ( SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,NULL,0,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0))) + SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),NULL,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),0)) ) EXAM_AMNT_TOT_SUM FROM P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR E WHERE E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE LIKE #sExmpAgentCode# || '%' AND E.BILL_DT >= TO_DATE((#sSearchFr# || '01'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND E.BILL_DT < ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE((#sSearchTo# || '01'), 'YYYYMMDD'), 1) GROUP BY E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE, TO_CHAR(E.BILL_DT,'YYYYMM'), E.FEE_TP ORDER BY EXMP_MONTH, E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE, E.FEE_TP ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_CNT , TO_CHAR(SUM(SE.EXMP_AMNT_SUM), '999,999,999,999') TOT_EXMP_AMNT_SUM , TO_CHAR(SUM(SE.EXMP_AMNT_PA_SUM), '999,999,999,999') TOT_EXMP_AMNT_PA_SUM , TO_CHAR(SUM(SE.EXAM_AMNT_TOT_SUM), '999,999,999,999') TOT_EXAM_AMNT_TOT_SUM FROM ( SELECT E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM(E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE) EXMP_AGENT_NM , TO_CHAR(E.BILL_DT,'YYYYMM') EXMP_MONTH , E.FEE_TP , P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM(#sPrtAtCode#, E.FEE_TP) FEE_NM , SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,NULL,0,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0))) EXMP_AMNT_SUM , SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),NULL,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),0)) EXMP_AMNT_PA_SUM , ( SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,NULL,0,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0))) + SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),NULL,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),0)) ) EXAM_AMNT_TOT_SUM FROM P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR E WHERE E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE LIKE #sExmpAgentCode# || '%' AND E.BILL_DT >= TO_DATE((#sSearchFr# || '01'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND E.BILL_DT < ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE((#sSearchTo# || '01'), 'YYYYMMDD'), 1) GROUP BY E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE, TO_CHAR(E.BILL_DT,'YYYYMM'), E.FEE_TP ORDER BY EXMP_MONTH, E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE, E.FEE_TP ) SE

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE , TO_CHAR(E.BILL_DT,'YYYYMM') EXMP_MONTH , E.FEE_TP , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM(E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE) EXMP_AGENT_NM , P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM(#sPrtAtCode#, E.FEE_TP) FEE_NM , SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,NULL,0,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0))) EXMP_AMNT_SUM , SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),NULL,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),0)) EXMP_AMNT_PA_SUM , ( SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,NULL,0,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0))) + SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),NULL,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),0)) ) EXAM_AMNT_TOT_SUM FROM P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR E WHERE E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE LIKE #sExmpAgentCode# || '%' AND E.BILL_DT >= TO_DATE((#sSearchFr# || '01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.BILL_DT < ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE((#sSearchTo# || '01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 1) GROUP BY E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE, TO_CHAR(BILL_DT,'YYYYMM'), E.FEE_TP ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_CNT , TO_CHAR(SUM(SE.EXMP_AMNT_SUM), '999,999,999,999') TOT_EXMP_AMNT_SUM , TO_CHAR(SUM(SE.EXMP_AMNT_PA_SUM), '999,999,999,999') TOT_EXMP_AMNT_PA_SUM , TO_CHAR(SUM(SE.EXAM_AMNT_TOT_SUM), '999,999,999,999') TOT_EXAM_AMNT_TOT_SUM FROM ( SELECT E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE , TO_CHAR(E.BILL_DT,'YYYYMM') EXMP_MONTH , E.FEE_TP , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM(E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE) EXMP_AGENT_NM , P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM(#sPrtAtCode#, E.FEE_TP) FEE_NM , SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,NULL,0,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0))) EXMP_AMNT_SUM , SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),NULL,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),0)) EXMP_AMNT_PA_SUM , ( SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',0,NULL,0,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0))) + SUM(DECODE(E.JINGSUJA,'PAT',NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),NULL,NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0),0)) ) EXAM_AMNT_TOT_SUM FROM P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR E WHERE E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE LIKE #sExmpAgentCode# || '%' AND E.BILL_DT >= TO_DATE((#sSearchFr# || '01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.BILL_DT < ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE((#sSearchTo# || '01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 1) GROUP BY E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE, TO_CHAR(BILL_DT,'YYYYMM'), E.FEE_TP ) SE
